summary: This bill, the 'Fair Assistance and Impartial Treatment of Help In Small Business Act' or 'FAITH in Small Business Act,' aims to ensure equal treatment for faith-based organizations within Small Business Administration (SBA) programs. It gives the January 19, 2021, SBA rule, which addressed this issue, the force and effect of law. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on January 16, 2025.
